data.name: 001 Game Creator - Free Add-On Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
How to Use

Use the Resource Importer (accessed through Resources > Import Resources) to add these tracks to your project. The files are located inside: [Steam folder]\steamapps\common\001 Game Creator\Map\Template\General


Suggestions

Got a suggestion for a new feature, resource or tutorial you'd like to see added to 001 Game Creator? Let us know on our Steam Forum: http://steamcommunity.com/app/347400/discussions/


About the Game

A collection of 34 new general music tracks for use in a variety of situations. This collection includes:

  • 2 NEW Battle tracks and 1 NEW Boss track
  • 1 NEW Castle, Cave and Church track
  • 2 NEW City tracks
  • 3 NEW Field tracks
  • 1 NEW Happy, Heat and Lose track
  • 2 NEW Mystery tracks
  • 2 NEW Night tracks
  • 3 NEW Peace tracks
  • 2 NEW Sand tracks and 2 NEW Sea tracks
  • 2 NEW Shop tracks
  • 1 NEW Snow and Title track
  • 3 NEW Town tracks and 2 NEW Village tracks

Music tracks composed by Joel Steudler, Dustin Crenna, and James Davis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 76 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL v2.1 or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 76 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL v3.0 or above
